issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
The {{RegisterImage}} operation, when run for an instance-store image, is supposed to fetch the user-provided bundle's manifest file, check its cryptographic signature, and if that succeeds, add a new image to the system.  That code that is meant to do this is currently commented out, and furthermore does not include certificates for the back end machines (e.g. NCs) that do the heavyweight portion of the {{BundleInstance}} operation.

This is not exploitable because walrus still verifies signatures when it goes to decrypt images.
fields.summary: RegisterImage does not verify bundle manifest signatures

comments.body:
[~gholms] suggested that there are three places that we, ideally, would perform verification:

1) verify signature in the manifest at RegisterImage on EC2 as 'eucalyptus' account (or as 'aws-exec-read' user)

2) verify that the manifest hasn't changed between RegisterImage and RunInstance
 - compute and store (presumably in the EMI table) fingerprint of the bundle manifest at RegisterImage
 - compute and verify the fingerprint of the bundle manifest at RunInstance

3) verify signature in the manifest at RunInstance on the back end

Moving (2) and (3) above into a separate ticket: EUCA-9542, so this ticket is just about (1): verify signature in the manifest at RegisterImage on EC2 as 'eucalyptus' account (or as 'aws-exec-read' account, once we have it)
Related to EUCA-9098 because the verification could be done as 'aws-exec-read', though that is not strictly necessary.
Fixed in the 3b56cb764fe4b980fc1a11c626f1ac8b37f92499 and merged into maint/4.0/testing
Would love a review form the services team. If okay, please, hand over to QA. Thanks! CC [~kedwards]
Images signed with inactive keys should be accepted at runtime so key rotation does not break existing images, but at _registration_ time this may be different.  We should test this against EC2.
[~mclark] and I tested that in AWS one user can upload and another (from the same account) register the image.
Changed based on [~sjones] suggestions. Sha ac7ad750528532a3f49f221af0a7da083a9a38d6
In bundle-instance case manifest needs to be validated using NC/Broker certificates.

{code}
With edited/bad signature eucalyptus/non-admin user::
[root@a-21 cirros]# euca-register cirrostest/cirrosraw.img.manifest.xml -n cirrostest1 --virtualization-type hvm
euca-register: error (InternalFailure): Manifest has invalid signature

With good signature and eucalyptus/non-admin user:
[root@a-21 cirros]# euca-register cirrostest/cirrosraw.img.manifest.xml -n cirrostest1 --virtualization-type hvm
IMAGE	emi-924ba02c

With non eucalyptus/non-admin user:
[root@a-21 cirros]# euca-register cirrostest/cirrosraw.img.manifest.xml -n cirrostest1 --virtualization-type hvm
euca-register: error (AuthFailure): Manifest is not accessible

---------------------------------------
Using non-eucalyptus account to repeat the test:
[root@a-21 cirros]# euca-upload-bundle -m /var/tmp/bundle-S46xhE/cirrosraw.img.manifest.xml -b cirrostest1
/var/tmp/bundle-S46xhE/cirrosraw.img.part.00 100% |=========================================================================================================================================|  10.00 MB   2.90 MB/s Time: 0:00:03
/var/tmp/bundle-S46xhE/cirrosraw.img.part.01 100% |=========================================================================================================================================|   1.80 MB   2.50 MB/s Time: 0:00:00
Uploaded cirrostest1/cirrosraw.img.manifest.xml
[root@a-21 cirros]# euca-register cirrostest1/cirrosraw.img.manifest.xml -n cirrostest1 --virtualization-type hvm 
IMAGE	emi-2e3fb2f8
[root@a-21 cirros]# vi /var/tmp/bundle-S46xhE/cirrosraw.img.manifest.xml
[root@a-21 cirros]# euca-upload-bundle -m /var/tmp/bundle-S46xhE/cirrosraw.img.manifest.xml -b cirrostest1
/var/tmp/bundle-S46xhE/cirrosraw.img.part.00 100% |=========================================================================================================================================|  10.00 MB   2.22 MB/s Time: 0:00:04
/var/tmp/bundle-S46xhE/cirrosraw.img.part.01 100% |=========================================================================================================================================|   1.80 MB   1.04 MB/s Time: 0:00:01
Uploaded cirrostest1/cirrosraw.img.manifest.xml
[root@a-21 cirros]# euca-register cirrostest1/cirrosraw.img.manifest.xml -n cirrostest2 --virtualization-type hvm 
euca-register: error (InternalFailure): Manifest has invalid signature

{code}

Installed Packages
Name        : eucalyptus
Arch        : x86_64
Version     : 4.0.2
Release     : 0.0.22276.64.20141002git039b884.e
